title: PES seat cancellation.
content: I went and got the refund form but what's a cancelled bank cheque and acknowledgement of original documents since I haven't submitted any of the original documents as of now.

comments.body: Whatever account you want your money in, get a cheque for that account and mark it cancelled. Search cancelled cheque on google, you'll understand. As for acknowledgement of original documents, I think it is the slip they gave to us during counselling.
Yeah, I can confirm. I went to the office today and got it done. OP you can DM me if you want. u/Educational-Guava-71
which other college are you going?
